entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Timmins
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:48 p.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 6.1Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Timmins Victor Power Airport 5:00 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
Condition: Light Rain

Visibility: 15 km

Wind: NNE 14 km/h

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the morning. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
